dc:description: Pale yellow glass bottle has rectangular body with asymmetrically squared base; the vessel tips to one side when standing.  High funnel neck has intact rim.  Bottom 1/3 of vessel broken off at some point, but has been restored.  Entire vessel has deep swirls encrusted with enamel.  A blue-grey film covers the vessel, and gold iridescence is highly visible.    Free blown and tooled in translucent almost colorless glass with yellow-green tinge.
